text:
Aligned Equations with amsmath

Use the amsmath 'align' environment to align on '='. Label key steps with \label{} and refer with \cref{}.

\begin{align}
  a + b &= c \label{eq:abc}\\
  d &= e + f
\end{align}
As shown in \cref{eq:abc}.

Cross-References with cleveref

Use \label and \cref for automatic prefixing (Eq., Def., Fig.).

See \cref{eq:abc,fig:diagram} for references.

Units with siunitx

Use \SI{<number>}{<unit>} and \si{<unit>} for units.

Velocity is \SI{3.0}{\meter\per\second} and g \approx \SI{9.81}{\meter\per\second\squared}.
